docs.lead_paragraph: The idea of containing an entire computer -- including display screen -- on what is essentially just a keyboard, has been in the fermenting stage for some time at Asus. Enter, this month, the all-in-one Asus Eee PC Keyboard, which is finally shipping, at a price of $600.
